statements: SELECT * FROM boxing_matches;
SELECT match_id, match_date, location FROM boxing_matches WHERE result = 'Win';
SELECT fighter1, fighter2 FROM boxing_matches WHERE location = 'Las Vegas' AND result = 'KO';
SELECT * FROM boxing_matches WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT match_id, result FROM boxing_matches WHERE fighter1 = 'Mike Tyson' OR fighter2 = 'Muhammad Ali';
SELECT * FROM boxing_matches WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT match_id, location, result FROM boxing_matches WHERE fighter1 = 'Mike Tyson';
SELECT * FROM boxing_matches ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT fighter1, fighter2, location FROM boxing_matches WHERE result = 'KO' OR result = 'TKO';

SELECT * FROM match_results ORDER BY rounds DESC;
SELECT winner, loser, method FROM match_results WHERE method = 'KO';
SELECT * FROM boxing_matches WHERE match_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT result, COUNT(*) FROM match_results GROUP BY result HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT fighter1, fighter2, result FROM boxing_matches WHERE result = 'Winner by KO';
SELECT * FROM boxing_matches WHERE fighter1 = 'Mike Tyson' AND location LIKE '%Vegas%';
SELECT fighter1, fighter2, winner, loser, method FROM boxing_matches JOIN match_results ON boxing_matches.match_id = match_results.match_id;

SELECT match_date, fighter1, fighter2 FROM boxing_matches WHERE result = 'KO';
